hero.title: Empower Your Farm with Intelligent Insights
hero.subtitle: Leverage AI to diagnose crop diseases, get tailored recommendations, and optimize your yield. The future of farming is here.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple, three-step process to get you started on your journey to smarter farming.

step1.title: Upload an Image
step1.description: Take a photo of your crop. Our AI analyzes it against a vast database of plant diseases and pests.

step2.title: Get Instant Diagnosis
step2.description: Receive an immediate, accurate diagnosis and learn about the potential impact on your crops.

step3.title: Receive Actionable Advice
step3.description: Get tailored, sustainable treatment plans and preventative measures to protect your harvest.

stopGuessing.title: Stop Guessing, Start Growing
stopGuessing.description: Our platform transforms your farming practices from reactive to proactive. Make data-driven decisions that save money, improve crop health, and increase your bottom line.
stopGuessing.p1_desc: Apply the right treatment at the right time, minimizing waste and maximizing effectiveness.
stopGuessing.p2_desc: Early detection and optimized recommendations lead to healthier crops and better harvests.
stopGuessing.imageAlt: A farmer examining a healthy plant leaf with a smartphone.

features.title: Smarter Farming, Simplified
features.subtitle: Our suite of AI-powered tools is designed to be intuitive and impactful, giving you an expert agronomist in your pocket.

diagnostics.title: AI-Powered Diagnostics
diagnostics.description: Snap a photo of a sick plant and get an instant diagnosis of potential diseases, pests, or nutrient deficiencies.

insights.title: Data-Driven Insights
insights.description: Track your farm's performance over time, analyze trends, and unlock insights to improve your operations season after season.

recommendations.title: Smart Recommendations
recommendations.description: Receive personalized, sustainable treatment and prevention plans tailored to your specific crop and diagnosis.

assistant.title: 24/7 AI Assistant
assistant.description: Ask questions about farming techniques, market prices, or sustainable practices and get instant, expert-level answers.

testimonials.title: Trusted by Farmers and Partners Worldwide

t1.quote: DamDoh's AI diagnostics saved our tomato crop from late blight. We got an accurate diagnosis in minutes and the recommended organic treatment worked wonders. It's a game-changer for smallholder farmers like us.
t1.name: Amina Bello

t2.quote: As an exporter, traceability is non-negotiable. DamDoh provides a seamless, verifiable log for our coffee shipments, giving our international buyers the confidence they need. It has opened up new premium markets for our partner co-ops.
t2.name: Carlos Gomez

t3.quote: The platform's ability to connect us with verified farmer cooperatives has streamlined our sourcing process. We've reduced our risk and improved the quality of our supply chain significantly.
t3.name: Priya Sharma

cta.title: Ready to Grow Smarter?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of farmers who are using DamDoh to build more profitable and sustainable futures.
